page.title: 07BLEASDALE C.E SCHOOL
page.content:
The building which is now the Infants Classroom was opened in 1850 and all ages of children were taught in this room up to the age of 14 years.The School House which was originally where the Head Teacher lived,is joined to the school by the staff room.
The modern extension comprising Hall, Junior Classroom, Dining Room,Kitchen and Junior Cloakrooms was opened in 1965.
The school is divided into an Infants and a Junior Class.The Infants are taught by Mrs.M.Beswick,the Head Teacher,and the Juniors by Mrs.F.Tillotson.
At present there are 18 pupils in the school.When children leave Bleasdale they go to Garstang High School.
